changes.title: Windsurf Editor | Windsurf
changes.content_preview:
Title: Windsurf Editor | Windsurf

We’re joining forces with Cognition
LEARN MORE
PRODUCTS
ENTERPRISE
PRICING
BLOG
RESOURCES
COMPANY
DOWNLOAD
Built to Keep You
in Flow State

The first agentic IDE, and then some. The Windsurf Editor is where the work of developers and AI truly flow together, allowing for a coding experience that feels like literal magic.

Download for Windows
See all download options

INTRODUCING THE FLOW EVOLUTION OF CHAT

Cascade

Cascade combines deep codebase understanding, a breadth of advanced tools, and a real-time awareness of your actions into a powerful, seamless, and collaborative flow. It is the most powerful way to code with AI.

Full contextual awareness

Deep contextual awareness allows you to run Cascade on production codebases and still get relevant suggestions.

Tab Tab Tab...Ship

A single keystroke, limitless power, complete flow. The full power of Windsurf Tab is exclusive to the Windsurf Editor. Our IDE plugins include only the autocomplete action
